Episodes.Title: The Death Row Convict and the Executioner
Episodes.Actors: Chiaki Kobayashi, Yumiri Hanamori, Mamiko Noto
Episodes.Plot: Gabimaru the ninja awaits execution, when he is visited by the executioner Yamada Asaemon with an unusual offer.

Episodes.Title: Screening and Choosing
Episodes.Actors: Chiaki Kobayashi, Yumiri Hanamori, Rie Takahashi
Episodes.Plot: Ten criminals are selected to travel to the island.

Episodes.Title: Weakness and Strength
Episodes.Actors: Chiaki Kobayashi, Yumiri Hanamori, Mamiko Noto
Episodes.Plot: Gabimaru and Sagiri arrive on the island, but immediately get into a fight over what should be the right course of action.

Episodes.Title: Hell and Paradise
Episodes.Actors: Chiaki Kobayashi, Yumiri Hanamori, Ryohei Kimura
Episodes.Plot: Gabimaru and Sagiri meet the kunoichi Yuzuriha and her executioner Senta, and they decide to team up to make their way through the island.

Episodes.Title: The Samurai and the Woman
Episodes.Actors: Chiaki Kobayashi, Yumiri Hanamori, Rie Takahashi
Episodes.Plot: While a council takes place between Gabimaru and Yuzuriha and their friends, the convict Nurugai and her guard Tenza fight off a horde of sea monsters.

Episodes.Title: Heart and Reason
Episodes.Actors: Chiaki Kobayashi, Yumiri Hanamori, Ryohei Kimura
Episodes.Plot: Sagiri must find her inner strength and balance to take care of a rampaging criminal.

Episodes.Title: Flowers and Offerings
Episodes.Actors: Chiaki Kobayashi, Yumiri Hanamori, Ryohei Kimura
Episodes.Plot: Gabimaru's party meets two mortal residents of the island, who give them shelter. Meanwhile, convict Aza Chobe and his guard Aza Toma meet two immortal residents, who beat them.

Episodes.Title: Student and Master
Episodes.Actors: Chikahiro Kobayashi, Yûsuke Kobayashi, Makoto Koichi
Episodes.Plot: Tenza and Nurugai are assaulted by an island resident. Even when Tenza's teacher Shion rescues them, it's not enough to save them.

Episodes.Title: Gods and People
Episodes.Actors: Chiaki Kobayashi, Yumiri Hanamori, Rie Takahashi
Episodes.Plot: Sagiri's group sets off in search of Horai. Gabimaru goes ahead and encounters the same powerful being that confronted Tenza.

Episodes.Title: Yin and Yang
Episodes.Actors: Chiaki Kobayashi, Yumiri Hanamori, Ryohei Kimura
Episodes.Plot: Mei attempts to explain something very important to Sagiri party in the forest. Shion tries to explain how he interacts with the world to Nurugai. A mysterious servant of the Tensen tries to explain why Aza Chobe and Toma shouldn'...

Episodes.Title: Weak and Strong
Episodes.Actors: Chiaki Kobayashi, Yumiri Hanamori, Ryohei Kimura
Episodes.Plot: Chobe brings new abilities to bear as he faces the Tensen's servants. A secret of Mei's is revealed to Gabimaru, hardening his resolve to fight and opening him up to a new perception of the world.

Episodes.Title: Dreams and Reality
Episodes.Actors: Chiaki Kobayashi, Yumiri Hanamori, Rie Takahashi
Episodes.Plot: Sagiri's party faces Mu Dan's seemingly unstoppable true form. Shion does his best to rise to the challenge with his mastery of waves.
